data.convo: Can I ask you a question ? Sure , go ahead . How do you get along with the American students in your classes ? I don ’ t have much contact with them . Really ? Why not ? Don ’ t you go up and talk to them ? No , I don ’ t . I ’ m too afraid of making mistakes in English . I don ’ t want to be laughed at . You won ’ t get anywhere that way . You ’ re the one who needs to practice English , so you should make the first move . Besides , most American students are really friendly and outgoing . They will be glad to talk to you . Thanks for the advice . I guess you ’ re right . It ’ s just hard to overcome my shyness . I really will try from now on . I promise .
